improvements Work Experience AEM Developer Att El Segundo CA August 2018 to Present Description It is the worlds largest telecommunications company the largest provider of mobile telephone services and the largest provider of fixed telephone services in the United States through ATT Communications My role in project is to create components templates and designing modular extensible development matching Hands on experience in creating components using Reactjs Good experience in creating components documentation using reactjs Developed Sling Servlets Services and Java Utility classes housed in bundles using Eclipse IDE and Apache Maven Build Integration Extensive use of CQ Tag Libraries in the components Users can create new CQ pages using the scaffold Have a complete understanding of outofbox asset search and indexed custom metadata properties Designed and developed custom assets search result page for list view Embedded many features like exporting search results in excel Worked with Maven to build and generate the jar files to deploy in the Felix Console Involved in writing JUnit test cases and suits using Eclipse IDE Develop custom components that display contents from REST
